testsuite.name: the user wants to enter the automation demo site page and register correctly

testcase.name: Fill registration form on the page Automation Demo site
testcase.classname: the user wants to enter the automation demo site page and register correctly

failure.message: net.serenitybdd.core.exceptions.SerenityManagedException: Error al diligenciar los datos, compruebe que el correo o el numero de celular no esten registrados previamente - Expected: an element that is not visible but: the element identified by css: div[ng-if='errorlabel'] [Email already exists Phone number already exists] was visible
